definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: Establish a beachhead at Peleliu Island on any difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 建立一個灘頭堡島在帛琉的任何困難。

sentences.english: From then on they had a beachhead to explore the rest of the network for reconnaissance.
sentences.chinese: 對他們有一個灘頭堡，探討進行偵察網絡的其餘部分。

sentences.english: The night we went to Birmingham by way of Beachy Head.
sentences.chinese: 那一夜，我們途徑灘頭堡，前往伯明翰。

sentences.english: The troops were landed at a beachhead.
sentences.chinese: 部隊被送到灘頭堡登陸。
